Right from creation, man, more than any some other creature, has maintained his distinctiveness through his capacity keep records of events affecting his existence by simply writing such down within report form. Without account writing, owners of agencies, manager of industries and individuals for example would have found the idea increasingly difficult if not impossible to execute assigned tasks; perform their own duties and run their concerns satisfactorily. Indeed, report writing can be a functional requirement in that day-to-day running of any kind of human endeavour.

Admittedly, it is from this practice of report writing that valuable records with corporate entities/organisations are maintained; departmental activities are checked; important decisions/policies affecting that lives of organizations and folks are taken as well as the rules and regulations governing the behaviours of an individual within organizations are additionally formulated and enforced.

What exactly is Report?

A written report refers to a page, which provides an bank account of something witnessed and also examined, or of work carried-out or of investigation together with conclusions arrived at on account of the investigation.

Why Have a Report?

Reports may be written for many motives, for example they may will:

(my partner and i) Inform

(ii) Propose

(3) Motivate

(iv) Prompt or play a role in debate

(/) Persuade

(vi) Impress

(Vii) Record

(viii) Bolster or build existing circumstances or beliefs

(ix) Instruct

In addition, they may have more intricate objectives such as adjusting people's attitudes or i did so a number of things simultaneously for one group of people and others for several groups.

Categories of Reports

Typically, reports can be classified consistent with their content, periodicity, length or form the following:

. Oral Reports

. Written Reviews

. Regular Reviews

. Ad Hoc Reviews

. Short and Long Reports

.
